title: Shojin
typeOfFood: Vegan, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out, Fusion, Gourmet
description: Shojin organic and natural food is a vegan Japanese restaurant in Los Angeles Little Tokyo. Its menu offers a variety of vegetable sushi rolls plus salads, appetizers, ramen noodle, and seitan entrees. Intimate, fine dining on the 3rd floor of Little Tokyo Square shopping mall with parking in the plaza lot. Busy on weekend evenings so reserve ahead. In 2015 it added an online vegan dessert store: pomegranatelaonlineshop.com
